title: Where Hilton's reputation goes down β€
content:
The condition of the room is the worst, the cleaning condition is very bad, it is not maintained at all. And they charged me for not trying, of course this was wrong and not true, but they never apologized to me. I was very offended and I felt that the staff were not being supervised by the manager. this is the worst experience 
And their menu board says VAT is included, but they additionally charged me VAT. I can't believe they use Hilton's name

hotel_name: ννΌ μΏ μ•λΌλ£Έν‘Έλ¥΄ (Hilton Kuala Lumpur)
title: The worst everβ€
content:
You know what?
Plz don't spend ur money for this terrible hotel.
U may experience offense or kinda discrimination.

We arrived at the hotel after 3:00pm n a receptionist told me just to wait but without any expected time.
Okay that is ok, acceptable but they said they will inform me when the room is ready. But u know what? After one n half hour waiting, i went to the lobby to ask if my room is ready n they just gave me the room key without saying sorry
I am so sure my room was ready earlier before i went but they just didnt try to reach me

The worst thing is this.
Receptionists wishpered just infront of me
What a nice hotel ever
If u want to waste ur money n time, u may choose this hotel

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Agoda and Hotel reviews:β€
content:
1) Agoda - unsatisfied on breakfast arrangements, family room but breakfast only for 1 pax as default which is ridiculous.
2) Radisson Hotel - basic amenities like laundry bag not able to provide to customer instead replace with thin garbage bag which also ridiculous compared to hotel stars status

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Fuss-free busines hotel with housekeeping issuesβ€
content:
1. Room and bathroom cleanliness is an issue.  It's not hard to do because the dust is clearly visible. Don't be lazy about this please. Bathroom wall need cleaning too. 
2. Staff truthfulness is an issue. Met a housekeeping staff at the outside the gym and asked for opening times. He mentioned 7 am-10pm, where I later found out this wasn't the case as it was a 24-hour gym. What the staff should have done was to find out the info at the front desk, and not bullshit the guest with false info.
3. Housekeeping not changing the pillow sheets, blanket sheets and probably the bed sheets too. The sheets might have looked clean, but it's not ethical to have the next guest sleep on sheets from previous guests.  Don't put your well paying guests through this, as budget hotels change their sheets too.  
4. Change your Housekeeping staff if they are not trainable.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Simply Awesome β€
content:
Great accomodation compared to many others. Good for solo and business travellers where applies. 

Room was clean and comfy. Room design was functional and really beats out many other bigger hotels! 

Pool was great!  however I wished it was a lap pool too. Water was ultra clean too! 

All in, it was a pleasant stay. π‘

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Staff not goodβ€
content:
During our stay, we took high tea & breakfast. However, as we are a bit late, 30 minutes late, 90% of food were gone. When we asked the staff to refill, they keep answered okay but till the end, they didn't refill. For both breakfast & high tea.
Do not pay more for room. The room very small & all rooms no bathtub.
Location is at the merge of Bangi & Putrajaya, not in Putrajaya region. So took about 40 minutes to airport.

The area quite dense. During peak hours, may traffic jam.

Cleanliness good.
Bed good.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Not Recommendedβ€
content:
Hair on pillow cases showing housekeeper did not change the pillow cases.
Waited more than 30mins to get the pillow cases changed after 2 times reminder.
Breakfast choices are limited.
Very small room, doesn't worth the price they charge.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Terrible sound proofβ€
content: I could hear furniture moving and also handphone sounds of the next rooms. The poach eggs are raw and the salad still has the plastic wraps cling to it.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: It was just an ok hotel for an expensive price.β€
content: Plus what annoyed me was there was mold in the toilet.  And!!! We couldnt even get breakfast at 730 cause the hall was full anc couldnβ€™t accommodate us. I feel like small things like this the hotel should be on top of it already. Do staggered breakfast time to control the crowd if you know you cant fit everyone

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: CLEANLINESS AND SERVICEβ€
content:
Bathroom was not clean. There were urine drops on toilet seat and moss on parts of shower area. The bedroom floor was not clean, with drops of food on the floor. 

We had to call housekeeping to clean the room but spend time supervising his work. We had issue with the TV channels and called maintenance. 2 men went in to the room with ther shoes on. No respect for the guests especially when the room is so small and the floor they stepped on was the only space for us to pray. We were already so tired when we arrived at the hotel but had to wait to have the room ready. 

The 1st night we ordered fish and chips and aglio olio from room service and enjoyed the food so much esp aglio olio. But when we ordered the aglio olio again the 2nd night, it was so tasteless with less ingredients. We complained but were told the chef had gone back. They sent us another one but it tasted only tomato puree. 

We had a very frustrating experience.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: λ¬΄λ‚ν•¨β€
content: In room telephone not working. Late response & no housekeeping done for my 2 days stay at the hotel.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Delayed check inβ€
content:
The room is yet ready and its almost midnight.
Requested for a discount as they didn't get the room ready but it was declined.
The checking in is also problematic (took more than 15 mins just to check in, despite the room is already delayed).

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Not worth for moneyβ€
content:
Honestly  i choose this place since its new. The price same as everlyn so expect the same qualities.
Its far away from putrajaya. My room level 1, view generator, airconds. Room is damn small and feel suffocated since the ceiling is low. No proper space to solat. No praying mat. The only nice - the bed.  Wont recommend this hotel

content: The room is very dirty and dusty. Not recommended. However the staffs are good and helpful.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Not really worth the moneyβ€
content: The room is relatively smaller compared to the amount you paid for the hotel. I can get spacious room in KL centre with the same amount paid. The room was a bit smelly and the receptionist not smiling at all. Instead of explaining what are the facilities at the hotel, she explained what not to do and give me stern warning. It gave me bad impression on the hotel. I do not recommend this hotel

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Sleepless Nightβ€
content: Central air-cond was not working and sweating the whole night. The sound of compressor was very close to the bed and unable to sleep due to the noise. Never in our past experience we have undergone such ordeal despite the hotel upgraded to  a new room without extra cost.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Bad Experience β€
content:
I have to change room two times. The first room i got not really ready for guest to check in. No towel provided and i have to wait almost an hour to get towel. The room aircond also not function very well. I have to change my room at 1.30 morning. After get the second room, i have been called by hotel the next day while i was at meeting to change my room again due to some maintenance.
Why must u do maintenance at the level your guest was staying????
So i got my third room, and again the aircond bot function very well even so bad. But there is maintenance help to figure it since its still early in the evening. I will never stay at this hotel even at the lowest price.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: New Hotel by Radisson but poor hotel managementβ€
content: Hotel is new, staff also new and not well train.

hotel_name: λ” λ§μ ¤λ€ μν…λΌ λ¦¬μ΅°νΈ (The Magellan Sutera Resort)
title: I really don't recommend aging and employee attitudes.β€
content:
I know why Magellan is second in Cota The facilities remain in the old way and the first impression of the facilities is so unfriendly that you can see the look of the lobby staff being annoying. I want to ask the company why they have assigned people who have no service spirit to the place
There was a blackout during the stay, but I'm not looking for any compensation. I think it could be because of the nature of Southeast Asia, or it could be because of old facilities
However, it is so disappointing that I do not give any guidance or response to the situation. If I revisit, I will not do it here.

Great breakfast. The main menu changes everyday and the restaurant view is perfect.
Want to visit next time as well!!

hotel_name: ν”„λκΈ°νλ‹ λ‘μΉ΄μ„ λ¦¬μ΅°νΈ (Frangipani Langkawi Resort)
title: λ§¤μ° μΆ‹μβ€
content: It was a good value for money hotel. The condition is quite old, but it has been well maintained and has been well without any inconvenience. All the staff are friendly, especially the English female manager who took good care of our family very kindly. Restaurant breakfast is normal. The sunset at Tengah beach in front of the main pool was so beautiful. Recommended for families with children. It is 5 minutes by grab to cenang beach, which has many restaurants and attractions, and it is worth walking as it is about 1 km on foot.

content: Kami berpuas hati menginap di hotel ini. content: Not bad but can improve more...our room main problem is have ants at the front door area...the floor of the rrom and bathroom also not so clean as there is too many hair on the floor so housekeeping should be improve...wifi also is a problem as it cannot be accessed due to too far way from the port and need to go to lift area for wifi...do we need to everytime to go to lift area for wifi it does not sound logic to us...so I can't say it's bad or good

hotel_name: μΉ΄μ΄μ   νΈν…” μ•¤ μ¤μ„νΈ λ§λΌμΉ΄ (Kaizen Hotel  & Suites Melaka)
title: Last Choiceβ€
content:
Room spacious
Wifi not function. My hp with Celcom and Digi data also no line/internet.
For this spacious room, aircond not so cold, make us feel hot all night.
Live band at night until 1 am.
The night food stall...not so tasty.

hotel_name: μΉ΄μ΄μ   νΈν…” μ•¤ μ¤μ„νΈ λ§λΌμΉ΄ (Kaizen Hotel  & Suites Melaka)
title: Poor serviceβ€
content:
1.Room not ready time to check-in at 3pm and only can check-in after 4.30pm. Reason - customer before check out late after 12pm but the problem is not only me, there's many family facing the same thing and waiting for their room at the lobby. Tak masuk akal if semua customer earlier LATE check out .
2. NO internet..NO television and their reason is TM problem.
3.My bad experience and this is the first and last i go there.

hotel_name: μΉ΄μ΄μ   νΈν…” μ•¤ μ¤μ„νΈ λ§λΌμΉ΄ (Kaizen Hotel  & Suites Melaka)
title: Noisy bedroom and Mosquitoesβ€
content:
1. Room very noisy from live band until 12.30am. Cant have proper rest until late night. Not recommended for family with older folks or babies
2. Bathroom got Mosquitoes and the draining hole at the shower didnt flow well.
3. Breakfast buffet line was horrible ; weird taste Fried Noodle, Have to argue with staff to replenish under seasoned scrambled eggs (the only protein served), the worse coffee ever tasted served here (Coffee with no taste of real coffee). 
4. Good location, nice building, good staff, but will not repeat staying here again.

hotel_name: μΉ΄μ΄μ   νΈν…” μ•¤ μ¤μ„νΈ λ§λΌμΉ΄ (Kaizen Hotel  & Suites Melaka)
title: Still not yet complete β€
content:
1. Unable to use Wi-Fi and also TV
2. I saw their cleaner (a guy) smoking during cleaning the room
3. Chlorine to strong at both swimming pool 
4. If your room facing the food street, at night live band will perform until 12pm and not recommended if you travel with baby/young kids

hotel_name: μΉ΄μ΄μ   νΈν…” μ•¤ μ¤μ„νΈ λ§λΌμΉ΄ (Kaizen Hotel  & Suites Melaka)
title: μ–‘νΈβ€
content:
1. Incompetant staff - Due to a system issue, I have to wait nearly 40 minutes to check in, but 4 customers who check in after me get the key first.Plus, they are failing to explain the issues, assuming that customers will understand the situation. 

2.The room is nice, but not suitable for eldery as its has lots of room that located quite far from the lift. I got room 66, which is the second last room. 

3. Breakfast - the food was not fill up, until customer notify them. They charge the food similar to other hotel, why you cant serve the same quantity and quality like other hotel. 

Overall, I would say that the location is good because it has food stalls near the hotel and a nice view, but there is still a lot that can be improved, especially their customer service. Also, if you have elderly guests, ask for a room close to the lift. otherwise, they must walk nearly 100 meters to the room.

hotel_name: μΉ΄μ΄μ   νΈν…” μ•¤ μ¤μ„νΈ λ§λΌμΉ΄ (Kaizen Hotel  & Suites Melaka)
title: Value for moneyβ€
content:
PROS : 
1. Spacious room
2. Lots of parking space available
3. Huge bed
4. High water pressure
5. Air conditioner functioning well

CONS :
1. Housekeeping will only make your room if u inform the reception to tidy up your room every single day of your stay
2. Eateries especially halal restaurant and convenient shop quite far from hotel location
3. During non festive celebration there is loud noise from live band on ground floor

hotel_name: 19th Century Boutique Hotel
title: Good β€
content: Sounds like your accommodation is cozy and conveniently located near the bus terminal and tourist attractions. The staff seems very friendly and attentive to guests. However, there was an inconvenience during your stay with the TV signal being faulty and unable to watch.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Heritage?β€
content: This hotel said to be heritage, but seems not at all. Missing door in cupboard, bath tub leaking. Bed and room was clean.  But good value for money . Should upgrade a bit.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Great placeβ€
content: It's a great location, room was spacious, easy to walk around jonker. The only cons is that since it is located near jonker, do expect some music, trishaw etc from the street so it might disturb your sleep a bit. There's no parking allocated too. Need to park your car at the open area in front Casa del Rio. Otherwise, great hotel.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Water heater not working β€
content: Water heater not working

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Service very very not goodβ€
content: Receptinonist very very very very bad bad bad

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: the nearest hotel to the night marketβ€
content: convenient & near to the night market.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Room with spider web and tiny bugsβ€
content: Quite disappointed with the room with spider web and tiny bugs on the wall. The TV also not working, without any cupboard for hanging clothes and no lift for guest to climb stairs for 2nd and 3rd floor. The receptionist told us there is wifi but we canβ€™t even get the signal at our room at 2nd floor and the receptionist will work till all guest have checked in the hotel and then she will leave the hotel and go home so left the hotel with no staff around to assist the guests, if the guest need any help which need to call her on mobile. But I can say the location of this hotel is good which near to Jonker Street and historic area.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Convenient and quietβ€
content: Convenient and quiet

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Located at Jonker walk β€
content: Perfect location to those who wish to visit Melaka heritage

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: recommendedβ€
content: stafff sangat peramah ! i will repeat ! dekat dengan semua tempat

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Pessimoβ€
content:
La camera che mi hanno dato puzzava di muffa, era molto sporca e con il pavimento in parquet marcio in diversi punti. Gli angoli dei muri presentavano seri problemi di umiditΓ . La situazione era talmente pessima che per la prima volta in vita mia ho abbandonato la stanza e preso una sistemazione in un altro hotel, perdendo i soldi della prenotazione (richiesta di rimborso inviata ad agodΓ  mi Γ¨ stata annullata perchΓ© le "policy della struttura" non permettono l'annullamento). Ma meglio cosΓ¬ che dormire in quella stanza.
Per lo stesso prezzo si trova di moooolto meglio.

content: If driving a bit hard because only have limited parking. If u R party gang this is strongly recommended. But if you plan to rest early a bit hard due next door is the hidden bar

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Not a good place to stayβ€
content: Randomly booked a hotel with bath tub. But when we arrived the room is not ready. And there is only 2 small boys greeted at the receptionist said that the room is not ready. After quite sometimes we wondering around buying time. The room is finally ready. Upon get the key we enter the room with A LOT of bed. Which is not what we booking. Request to change to a small room but no bath tub. Not recommended at all. Only stairs no lift not recommended for family with old folks and small children as its facilities not that friendly for them.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: λ³΄ν†µβ€
content: The room rate is cheaper if you book walk in. The location is good. But the room is not clean.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Perfect stayβ€
content: Our stay was perfect. The location was great, with beautiful views of the river. The room was spacious and clean. The staff was friendly and helpful. The facilities were amazing, especially the hot water. Shopping was within walking distance. Highly recommend this property for its value for money and walkability.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Non exisitant staff β€
content:
- Tv was not setup properly.
- No coffee and tea sachets.
- No other staff to be seen, just receptionist.
- Rooms were not ready even for late check-in.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Disappointed β€
content: Having read a number of reviews prior to booking my stay, I expected something a lot better. Whilst the location is fabulous, the place is more like a large Homestay than a hotel. It is old, poorly run, untidy, noisy, in desperate need of maintenance and not that clean. By comparison to other alternatives this only just passes the test and only just value for money.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: λ³΄ν†µβ€
content: Bilik besar. Aircond ok la. Tak berapa sejuk. Mungkin tak servis. Tv takde siaran. Kebersihan ok. Kawasan sangat strategik. Dengar sangat dengan jonker walk, a famosa, melaka river, menara taming sari. Untuk penginapan ok

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: λ¬΄λ‚ν•¨β€
content: Cleanliness and Room Tidiness needs more to be improved

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Terribleβ€
content: Lousy... Hated it

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: One night stay otw to JBβ€
content: Rustic hotel, where it need not try to look old - it IS old. Rooms are like how you would expect rooms in a monastery to look like, but good enough for what you pay. Laminated flooring, hot water and aircon cool enough. Wifi works. Managed by an elderly lady with her grandson, so be kind to them as they are doing their best. Carpark nearby at RM9 per day. Loads of eating places within walking distance, so perfect for a free and easy break. Across is a Police Station, so you should feel safe. What's not to like if you try to see the best in everything?

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Short trip to Melakaβ€
content: The location of the room is incredibly convenient!

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Suggest to do upkeep on furniture & appliancesβ€
content: Bed frame always got squeezy sound, a small movement will have sound. Water heater no heat at all. Other than above all is well and location is good.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Superb locationβ€
content: Booked this hotel because we missed our bus back to Singapore. The hotel was a little bit old, but simple, functional. We were at the room on the first level, the reception was not the best but ultimately it did its job and we were able to rest for the night. I would say it's not for fussy travellers but if you value a good location and polite service this would be perfect. I still remember the lady at the reception and her little helper - they were very nice and that alone made the stay very very pleasant and enjoyable.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Niceβ€
content: Nice location, reasonable price , comfortable room and friendly staff

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: awesome placeβ€
content: The place is fantastic! Our room was initially assigned to be on the first floor, which was HORRIBLE (mosquitos everywhere in the room + lights malfunctions, very humid and hot, no circulation of airs); thus, we asked for rooms on level 3. The aunty was very kind and allowed us to stay on level 3, which completely changed our mind!! The room was spacious, with facillities meeting basic needs. Value for money! Do rembmer to ask for rooms on level 3!!!

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: One of the best!β€
content:
What I luv most are:
Location - right next to Jonker Walk and Hard Rock Cafe
Room - spacious, clean, comfortable and feels like genuine Malacca night
Staff - very friendly and accomodating
Security - the atmosphere is very safe and so much trust 

Highly recommended π‘

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: μµκ³ β€
content: Staff baik, membantu..bilik bersih kemas teratur..urusan semua lancar.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Very good β€
content: The location is just inside Jonker Street, within walking distance to the Red House, church, fort, etc. The only regret is that the parking space is relatively inconvenient.  The counter clerk is a Chinese who is friendly and easy to get along with. He will patiently explain the relevant information of the hotel to us.  Because it is an ancient building, the hotel does not have an elevator, so you can only walk upstairs. People with inconvenient legs and feet may have to ask the hotel to arrange a room on the ground floor in advance.  I have to say that the hotel is kept very clean, the rooms are spacious, have all the facilities, and have a little retro style.  Overall, I rate it 9/10

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: μµκ³ β€
content: Best sangattt

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: comfortable β€
content: good for solo travel,...

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: dirty, smelly, poor management system and old building β€
content:
1. When entering the hotel front desk dirty and smelly.
2. Poor management system (old school style) no computer system... handle with a old lady (in changed house keeping and front desk) and a child. 
3. Suggestions: very good location near by Jonker street. Is time to renovation, the hotel dangerous structure room wall very big crack and dropped wall dust. 
4. The room is big, but very dirty and smelly
5. No provided car parking

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Avoid at all costβ€
content: If you're looking to have comfortable stay throughout the night, avoid this place at all cost. Though the location is excellent, the maintenance and cleanliness are just horrendous.

hotel_name: HEEREN BY THE RIVER HOTEL
title: Run down and unkeptβ€
content:
I was shown a mouldy room without windows and a room with windows facing a low wall outside, which I wonβ€™t recommend to open as there were rats and spiders just outside. 

Upon choosing the latter, I was astonished to find the room not cleaned up after the last guest left. 

Settled in after helping to setup the room and soon realised that thereβ€™s no internet, tv not usable and water from the shower was very very weakβ€¦. 

Finally got an β€upgradeβ€ after our feedback and given a room right next to the road. Was noisy but thatβ€™s a given. But furnitures were old and falling apart. No ventilation in the bathroom, water dripping from where the ventilator used to be and the bathtub drainage actually just spillover to the bathroom floor. 

As mentioned by some reviewers, Iβ€™d say the receptionist is there at random time and thereβ€™s no staff on duty overnight.
